about: Hey. My name is Anton and I'm from Germany. All of my sounds are recorded on my own. ++ CREDIT ME Please remember you have to credit me. For example: "[Soundname] by dersuperanton/freesound.org". If you have questions or can't mention me please send me a message. :) ++ SEND ME YOUR PROJECTS If you use my sounds I would love to get a link to your project! You don't have to do this but I love to see where you use my sounds. Just click above "Send a private message to this user" or post it to the comments of the sound.
